issue.title: Laser is not being displayed properly in raring+hydro

content.raw:
Before installing bumblebee I could not use the lidar, I was using Intel's CPU card with a nouveau driver. But after successfully installing bumblebee I was able to see the lidear when running the "cpu" version of the multisense_sl_cpu.urdf files in the atlas_description/urdf folder.

There has been very little spoken about this problem and it may be affecting many.
content.html:

There has been very little spoken about this problem and it may be affecting many.
